item.title: First Lab-Grown Whole Cow’s Milk To Debut In The U.S.
item.description: Boston-based startup Brown Foods is preparing to showcase UnReal Milk, the world’s first lab-grown whole cow’s milk— produced without a single cow.

item.title: 2024's Best New Anime, ‘Solo Leveling,’ Is Stupidly Simple, And So Much Fun
